reading.english: My name is John.
reading.portuguese: Meu nome é John.

reading.english: The cat is small.
reading.portuguese: O gato é pequeno.

reading.english: I have two dogs.
reading.portuguese: Eu tenho dois cachorros.

reading.english: This is my house.
reading.portuguese: Esta é minha casa.

reading.english: Good morning everyone.
reading.portuguese: Bom dia a todos.

reading.english: She usually wakes up at seven o'clock.
reading.portuguese: Ela geralmente acorda às sete horas.

reading.english: I am going to visit my grandparents tomorrow.
reading.portuguese: Eu vou visitar meus avós amanhã.

reading.english: There are many books on the shelf.
reading.portuguese: Há muitos livros na estante.

reading.english: He can swim very well now.
reading.portuguese: Ele consegue nadar muito bem agora.

reading.english: We haven't seen that movie yet.
reading.portuguese: Nós ainda não vimos aquele filme.

reading.english: I wish I could speak French fluently.
reading.portuguese: Eu gostaria de poder falar francês fluentemente.

reading.english: She has been working for this company since two thousand and ten.
reading.portuguese: Ela trabalha para esta empresa desde dois mil e dez.

reading.english: Unless it rains tomorrow, we will go to the beach.
reading.portuguese: A menos que chova amanhã, iremos à praia.

reading.english: The book that I bought yesterday was really interesting.
reading.portuguese: O livro que comprei ontem foi realmente interessante.

reading.english: I would travel more if I had more time.
reading.portuguese: Eu viajaria mais se tivesse mais tempo.

reading.english: Despite feeling exhausted, she managed to finish the presentation on time.
reading.portuguese: Apesar de se sentir exausta, ela conseguiu terminar a apresentação no prazo.

reading.english: By the time we arrive at the station, the train will have already left.
reading.portuguese: Quando chegarmos à estação, o trem já terá partido.

reading.english: The project, having been delayed several times, finally received approval from management.
reading.portuguese: O projeto, tendo sido adiado várias vezes, finalmente recebeu aprovação da gerência.

reading.english: No sooner had the meeting started than the fire alarm went off.
reading.portuguese: Mal a reunião começou, o alarme de incêndio disparou.

reading.english: It's high time we addressed these environmental issues more seriously.
reading.portuguese: Já é hora de abordarmos essas questões ambientais mais seriamente.

reading.english: Scarcely had the conference begun when technical difficulties disrupted the proceedings.
reading.portuguese: Mal a conferência havia começado quando dificuldades técnicas interromperam os trabalhos.

reading.english: The legislation, albeit controversial, represents significant progress in civil rights protection.
reading.portuguese: A legislação, embora controversa, representa progresso significativo na proteção dos direitos civis.

reading.english: Under no circumstances should confidential information be disclosed to unauthorized personnel.
reading.portuguese: Em nenhuma circunstância informações confidenciais devem ser divulgadas a pessoal não autorizado.

reading.english: Were it not for renewable energy innovations, climate change mitigation would be substantially more challenging.
reading.portuguese: Não fossem as inovações em energia renovável, a mitigação das mudanças climáticas seria substancialmente mais desafiadora.

reading.english: The phenomenon, insofar as current research indicates, requires interdisciplinary collaboration for comprehensive understanding.
reading.portuguese: O fenômeno, na medida em que a pesquisa atual indica, requer colaboração interdisciplinar para compreensão abrangente.

reading.english: The ramifications of this unprecedented economic downturn extend far beyond conventional macroeconomic indicators.
reading.portuguese: As ramificações desta crise econômica sem precedentes se estendem muito além dos indicadores macroeconômicos convencionais.

reading.english: So entrenched are these societal norms that any substantive reform encounters formidable institutional resistance.
reading.portuguese: Tão arraigadas estão essas normas sociais que qualquer reforma substantiva encontra resistência institucional formidável.

reading.english: The proposition, however laudable its underlying intentions, fails to adequately address the multifaceted complexities inherent in the situation.
reading.portuguese: A proposição, por mais louváveis que sejam suas intenções subjacentes, não consegue abordar adequadamente as complexidades multifacetadas inerentes à situação.

reading.english: Little did contemporary observers anticipate the profound transformative impact these technological innovations would ultimately exert.
reading.portuguese: Pouco anteciparam os observadores contemporâneos o profundo impacto transformador que essas inovações tecnológicas exerceriam.

reading.english: The epistemological implications, as yet insufficiently scrutinized, warrant rigorous interdisciplinary examination and empirical validation.
reading.portuguese: As implicações epistemológicas, ainda insuficientemente examinadas, justificam exame interdisciplinar rigoroso e validação empírica.

reading.english: I am happy.
reading.portuguese: Eu estou feliz.

reading.english: She goes to school.
reading.portuguese: Ela vai para a escola.

reading.english: I don't understand this word.
reading.portuguese: Eu não entendo esta palavra.

reading.english: Can you repeat that, please?
reading.portuguese: Você pode repetir isso, por favor?

reading.english: I have been working here since 2010.
reading.portuguese: Eu trabalho aqui desde 2010.

reading.english: If it rains tomorrow, we'll stay home.
reading.portuguese: Se chover amanhã, ficaremos em casa.

reading.english: The proposal was rejected due to lack of funding.
reading.portuguese: A proposta foi rejeitada devido à falta de financiamento.

reading.english: Notwithstanding the challenges, we persevered.
reading.portuguese: Não obstante os desafios, perseveramos.

reading.english: The paradigm shift in technology revolutionized communication.
reading.portuguese: A mudança de paradigma na tecnologia revolucionou a comunicação.

reading.english: Her eloquence belied her apparent youth.
reading.portuguese: Sua eloquência contradizia sua aparente juventude.

reading.english: The epistemological foundations warrant meticulous scrutiny.
reading.portuguese: Os fundamentos epistemológicos justificam escrutínio meticuloso.

reading.english: The symbiotic relationship engenders cultural evolution.
reading.portuguese: O relacionamento simbiótico engendra evolução cultural.

reading.english: I like music.
reading.portuguese: Eu gosto de música.

reading.english: The table is brown.
reading.portuguese: A mesa é marrom.

reading.english: They watch TV.
reading.portuguese: Eles assistem TV.

reading.english: My mother cooks dinner.
reading.portuguese: Minha mãe cozinha jantar.

reading.english: The sky is clear.
reading.portuguese: O céu está claro.

reading.english: We need water.
reading.portuguese: Nós precisamos de água.

reading.english: The phone rings.
reading.portuguese: O telefone toca.

reading.english: She reads books.
reading.portuguese: Ela lê livros.

reading.english: The door is open.
reading.portuguese: A porta está aberta.

reading.english: I want coffee.
reading.portuguese: Eu quero café.

reading.english: The door is open.
reading.portuguese: A porta está aberta.

reading.english: She has blue eyes.
reading.portuguese: Ela tem olhos azuis.

reading.english: We like pizza.
reading.portuguese: Nós gostamos de pizza.

reading.english: He is tall.
reading.portuguese: Ele é alto.

reading.english: I didn't see him yesterday.
reading.portuguese: Eu não o vi ontem.

reading.english: She is wearing a red dress.
reading.portuguese: Ela está vestindo um vestido vermelho.

reading.english: Do you have any plans for tonight?
reading.portuguese: Você tem planos para hoje à noite?

reading.english: I have never been to Japan.
reading.portuguese: Eu nunca fui ao Japão.

reading.english: They are not coming to the party.
reading.portuguese: Eles não vêm à festa.

reading.english: Can you help me with this?
reading.portuguese: Você pode me ajudar com isso?

reading.english: I usually go to bed at 11 PM.
reading.portuguese: Eu geralmente vou para a cama às 11 da noite.

reading.english: She has already finished her homework.
reading.portuguese: Ela já terminou a lição de casa.

reading.english: Are you interested in music?
reading.portuguese: Você está interessado em música?

reading.english: I need to buy some groceries.
reading.portuguese: Eu preciso comprar mantimentos.

reading.english: She arrived late yesterday.
reading.portuguese: Ela chegou atrasada ontem.

reading.english: We are having dinner now.
reading.portuguese: Nós estamos jantando agora.

reading.english: Do you have any siblings?
reading.portuguese: Você tem irmãos?

reading.english: I have never been to Asia.
reading.portuguese: Eu nunca fui à Ásia.

reading.english: I wish I could travel more often.
reading.portuguese: Eu gostaria de poder viajar mais vezes.

reading.english: She apologized for arriving late.
reading.portuguese: Ela se desculpou por chegar atrasada.

reading.english: If it doesn't rain, we'll go hiking.
reading.portuguese: Se não chover, iremos caminhar.

reading.english: I have been living here for five years.
reading.portuguese: Eu moro aqui há cinco anos.

reading.english: He finds it hard to concentrate.
reading.portuguese: Ele acha difícil se concentrar.

reading.english: They decided to postpone the event.
reading.portuguese: Eles decidiram adiar o evento.

reading.english: I used to play tennis every weekend.
reading.portuguese: Eu costumava jogar tênis todo fim de semana.

reading.english: The movie that we saw was excellent.
reading.portuguese: O filme que vimos foi excelente.

reading.english: She complained about the poor service.
reading.portuguese: Ela reclamou sobre o serviço ruim.

reading.english: I have been waiting for twenty minutes.
reading.portuguese: Eu estou esperando há vinte minutos.

reading.english: If I were rich, I would buy a yacht.
reading.portuguese: Se eu fosse rico, compraria um iate.

reading.english: She complained that the food was cold.
reading.portuguese: Ela reclamou que a comida estava fria.

reading.english: I am used to waking up early.
reading.portuguese: Eu estou acostumado a acordar cedo.

reading.english: The book which I read last week was excellent.
reading.portuguese: O livro que eu li na semana passada foi excelente.

reading.english: The proposal was rejected due to insufficient funding.
reading.portuguese: A proposta foi rejeitada devido a financiamento insuficiente.

reading.english: Had I known earlier, I would have acted differently.
reading.portuguese: Se eu soubesse antes, teria agido de forma diferente.

reading.english: The implications of this discovery are far-reaching.
reading.portuguese: As implicações desta descoberta são de longo alcance.

reading.english: She attributed her success to perseverance.
reading.portuguese: Ela atribuiu seu sucesso à perseverança.

reading.english: Notwithstanding the difficulties, we succeeded.
reading.portuguese: Não obstante as dificuldades, tivemos sucesso.

reading.english: The phenomenon warrants further investigation.
reading.portuguese: O fenômeno justifica investigação adicional.

reading.english: She has a propensity for creative thinking.
reading.portuguese: Ela tem uma propensão para pensamento criativo.

reading.english: The discrepancy between theory and practice is apparent.
reading.portuguese: A discrepância entre teoria e prática é aparente.

reading.english: He postulated that the experiment would fail.
reading.portuguese: Ele postulou que o experimento falharia.

reading.english: The paradigm shift requires methodological adaptation.
reading.portuguese: A mudança de paradigma requer adaptação metodológica.

reading.english: Had the weather been better, we would have gone hiking.
reading.portuguese: Se o tempo estivesse melhor, teríamos ido caminhar.

reading.english: The research, once published, will influence the field significantly.
reading.portuguese: A pesquisa, uma vez publicada, influenciará o campo significativamente.

reading.english: She attributed her success to perseverance and hard work.
reading.portuguese: Ela atribuiu seu sucesso à perseverança e trabalho duro.

reading.english: Notwithstanding the challenges, the team persevered admirably.
reading.portuguese: Não obstante os desafios, a equipe perseverou admiravelmente.

reading.english: The juxtaposition of tradition and modernity creates synthesis.
reading.portuguese: A justaposição de tradição e modernidade cria síntese.

reading.english: Notwithstanding empirical evidence, skepticism prevails.
reading.portuguese: Não obstante evidência empírica, o ceticismo prevalece.

reading.english: The epistemological foundations warrant meticulous examination.
reading.portuguese: Os fundamentos epistemológicos justificam exame meticuloso.

reading.english: Her rhetorical dexterity belied apparent timidity.
reading.portuguese: Sua destreza retórica contradizia aparente timidez.

reading.english: The symbiotic nexus engenders cultural metamorphosis.
reading.portuguese: O nexus simbiótico engendra metamorfose cultural.

reading.english: The confluence of determinants precipitated paradigm shift.
reading.portuguese: A confluência de determinantes precipitou mudança de paradigma.

reading.english: The paradigm revolutionized interaction paradigms.
reading.portuguese: O paradigma revolucionou paradigmas de interação.

reading.english: Notwithstanding substantial corroboration, dissent persists.
reading.portuguese: Não obstante corroboração substancial, dissensão persiste.

reading.english: The quintessence of diplomacy resides in nuance.
reading.portuguese: A quintessência da diplomacia reside na nuance.

reading.english: Ramifications emanating transcend conventional boundaries.
reading.portuguese: Ramificações emanando transcendem fronteiras convencionais.

reading.english: Were circumstances different, the outcome would be dissimilar.
reading.portuguese: Se as circunstâncias fossem diferentes, o resultado seria diferente.

reading.english: The paradigm shift revolutionized communication paradigms.
reading.portuguese: A mudança de paradigma revolucionou paradigmas de comunicação.

reading.english: Notwithstanding substantial evidence, skepticism endures unabated.
reading.portuguese: Não obstante evidência substancial, o ceticismo perdura inabalável.

reading.english: The confluence of influences engendered unique synthesis.
reading.portuguese: A confluência de influências engendrou síntese única.

reading.english: Epistemological interrogation necessitates methodological transcendence.
reading.portuguese: Interrogação epistemológica necessita transcendência metodológica.

reading.english: Symbiotic interrelationships engender multifaceted evolution.
reading.portuguese: Inter-relações simbióticas engendra evolução multifacetada.

reading.english: Notwithstanding incontrovertible substantiation, paradigmatic resistance endures.
reading.portuguese: Não obstante substantiação incontrovertível, resistência paradigmática perdura.

reading.english: Quintessential rhetorical manifestations reside in lexical perspicacity.
reading.portuguese: Manifestações retóricas quintessenciais residem na perspicácia lexical.

reading.english: Confluence precipitated unprecedented paradigmatic metamorphosis.
reading.portuguese: Confluência precipitou metamorfose paradigmática sem precedentes.

reading.english: Epistemological scrutiny necessitates methodological paradigm transcendence.
reading.portuguese: Escrutínio epistemológico necessita transcendência de paradigma metodológico.

reading.english: Epistemological interrogation necessitates entrenched paradigm transcendence.
reading.portuguese: Interrogação epistemológica necessita transcendência de paradigma arraigado.

reading.english: Symbiotic nexus engenders transformative societal metamorphosis.
reading.portuguese: Nexus simbiótico engendra metamorfose societal transformadora.

reading.english: Notwithstanding incontrovertible corroboration, theoretical underpinnings warrant scrutiny.
reading.portuguese: Não obstante corroboração incontrovertível, fundamentos teóricos justificam escrutínio.

reading.english: Quintessential manifestation resides in perspicacious lexical orchestration.
reading.portuguese: Manifestação quintessencial reside na orquestração lexical perspicaz.

writing_translate.portuguese: Eu tenho um cachorro.
writing_translate.english: I have a dog.
acceptedVariations: I have a dog
I've got a dog
I own a dog

writing_translate.portuguese: Minha casa é grande.
writing_translate.english: My house is big.
acceptedVariations: My house is big
My house is large

writing_translate.portuguese: Eu acordei às seis horas hoje.
writing_translate.english: I woke up at six o'clock today.
acceptedVariations: I woke up at six o'clock today
I woke up at 6 o'clock today
I woke up at six today

writing_translate.portuguese: Nós vamos viajar no próximo mês.
writing_translate.english: We are going to travel next month.
acceptedVariations: We are going to travel next month
We will travel next month
We're going to travel next month

writing_translate.portuguese: Eu tenho trabalhado muito ultimamente.
writing_translate.english: I have been working a lot lately.
acceptedVariations: I have been working a lot lately
I've been working a lot lately
I have been working hard lately

writing_translate.portuguese: Se eu tivesse tempo, aprenderia francês.
writing_translate.english: If I had time, I would learn French.
acceptedVariations: If I had time, I would learn French
If I had time I would learn French
If I had the time, I would learn French

writing_translate.portuguese: Apesar da chuva, decidimos sair.
writing_translate.english: Despite the rain, we decided to go out.
acceptedVariations: Despite the rain, we decided to go out
Despite the rain we decided to go out
In spite of the rain, we decided to go out

writing_translate.portuguese: A empresa tem expandido suas operações globalmente.
writing_translate.english: The company has been expanding its operations globally.
acceptedVariations: The company has been expanding its operations globally
The company has expanded its operations globally

writing_translate.portuguese: Não apenas ele terminou o projeto, mas também superou as expectativas.
writing_translate.english: Not only did he finish the project, but he also exceeded expectations.
acceptedVariations: Not only did he finish the project, but he also exceeded expectations
Not only did he finish the project but he also exceeded expectations

writing_translate.portuguese: A implementação da nova política tem sido fundamental para o sucesso.
writing_translate.english: The implementation of the new policy has been crucial to the success.
acceptedVariations: The implementation of the new policy has been crucial to the success
The implementation of the new policy has been essential to the success
Implementing the new policy has been crucial to the success

writing_translate.portuguese: As ramificações desta decisão ainda não foram totalmente compreendidas.
writing_translate.english: The ramifications of this decision have yet to be fully understood.
acceptedVariations: The ramifications of this decision have yet to be fully understood
The ramifications of this decision are yet to be fully understood

acceptedVariations: The paradigm shift necessitates a comprehensive reevaluation of our methodologies

acceptedVariations: She has a propensity for asking pertinent questions
She has a tendency for asking pertinent questions

writing_translate.portuguese: O fenômeno justifica investigação adicional.
writing_translate.english: The phenomenon warrants further investigation.
acceptedVariations: The phenomenon warrants further investigation

writing_translate.portuguese: Se o tempo estivesse melhor, teríamos ido caminhar.
writing_translate.english: Had the weather been better, we would have gone hiking.
acceptedVariations: Had the weather been better, we would have gone hiking
If the weather had been better, we would have gone hiking

writing_translate.portuguese: A pesquisa, uma vez publicada, influenciará o campo significativamente.
writing_translate.english: The research, once published, will influence the field significantly.
acceptedVariations: The research, once published, will influence the field significantly

writing_translate.portuguese: Ela atribuiu seu sucesso à perseverança e trabalho duro.
writing_translate.english: She attributed her success to perseverance and hard work.
acceptedVariations: She attributed her success to perseverance and hard work

writing_translate.portuguese: Não obstante os desafios, a equipe perseverou admiravelmente.
writing_translate.english: Notwithstanding the challenges, the team persevered admirably.
acceptedVariations: Notwithstanding the challenges, the team persevered admirably
Despite the challenges, the team persevered admirably

writing_translate.portuguese: A justaposição de cores cria um efeito visual impressionante.
writing_translate.english: The juxtaposition of colors creates a striking visual effect.
acceptedVariations: The juxtaposition of colors creates a striking visual effect
The juxtaposition of colours creates a striking visual effect

writing_translate.portuguese: Sua eloquência contradizia sua aparente juventude.
writing_translate.english: Her eloquence belied her apparent youth.
acceptedVariations: Her eloquence belied her apparent youth
Her eloquence contradicted her apparent youth

writing_translate.portuguese: A legislação, embora controversa, representa progresso significativo.
writing_translate.english: The legislation, albeit controversial, represents significant progress.
acceptedVariations: The legislation, albeit controversial, represents significant progress
The legislation, although controversial, represents significant progress

writing_translate.portuguese: Não obstante evidência empírica, o ceticismo prevalece.
writing_translate.english: Notwithstanding empirical evidence, skepticism prevails.
acceptedVariations: Notwithstanding empirical evidence, skepticism prevails
Despite empirical evidence, skepticism prevails

writing_translate.portuguese: Os fundamentos epistemológicos justificam exame meticuloso.
writing_translate.english: The epistemological foundations warrant meticulous examination.
acceptedVariations: The epistemological foundations warrant meticulous examination
The epistemological foundations require meticulous examination

writing_translate.portuguese: Sua destreza retórica contradizia aparente timidez.
writing_translate.english: Her rhetorical dexterity belied apparent timidity.
acceptedVariations: Her rhetorical dexterity belied apparent timidity
Her rhetorical dexterity contradicted apparent timidity

writing_translate.portuguese: O nexus simbiótico engendra metamorfose cultural.
writing_translate.english: The symbiotic nexus engenders cultural metamorphosis.
acceptedVariations: The symbiotic nexus engenders cultural metamorphosis
The symbiotic nexus generates cultural metamorphosis

writing_translate.portuguese: A confluência de determinantes precipitou mudança paradigmática.
writing_translate.english: The confluence of determinants precipitated paradigm shift.
acceptedVariations: The confluence of determinants precipitated paradigm shift

writing_translate.portuguese: Se as circunstâncias fossem diferentes, o resultado seria diferente.
writing_translate.english: Were circumstances different, the outcome would be dissimilar.
acceptedVariations: Were circumstances different, the outcome would be dissimilar
If circumstances were different, the outcome would be dissimilar

writing_translate.portuguese: A mudança de paradigma revolucionou paradigmas de comunicação.
writing_translate.english: The paradigm shift revolutionized communication paradigms.
acceptedVariations: The paradigm shift revolutionized communication paradigms

writing_translate.portuguese: Não obstante evidência substancial, o ceticismo perdura inabalável.
writing_translate.english: Notwithstanding substantial evidence, skepticism endures unabated.
acceptedVariations: Notwithstanding substantial evidence, skepticism endures unabated
Despite substantial evidence, skepticism endures unabated

writing_translate.portuguese: A confluência de influências engendrou síntese única.
writing_translate.english: The confluence of influences engendered unique synthesis.
acceptedVariations: The confluence of influences engendered unique synthesis
The confluence of influences generated unique synthesis

writing_translate.portuguese: Os fundamentos epistemológicos justificam escrutínio meticuloso.
writing_translate.english: The epistemological foundations warrant meticulous scrutiny.
acceptedVariations: The epistemological foundations warrant meticulous scrutiny
The epistemological foundations require meticulous scrutiny

writing_translate.portuguese: O relacionamento simbiótico engendra evolução cultural.
writing_translate.english: The symbiotic relationship engenders cultural evolution.
acceptedVariations: The symbiotic relationship engenders cultural evolution
The symbiotic relationship generates cultural evolution

writing_translate.portuguese: As ramificações desta decisão ainda não foram totalmente compreendidas.
writing_translate.english: The ramifications of this decision have yet to be fully understood.
acceptedVariations: The ramifications of this decision have yet to be fully understood
The ramifications of this decision are yet to be fully understood

writing_translate.portuguese: A mudança de paradigma exige reavaliação metodológica abrangente.
writing_translate.english: The paradigm shift necessitates comprehensive methodological reevaluation.
acceptedVariations: The paradigm shift necessitates comprehensive methodological reevaluation
The paradigm shift requires comprehensive methodological reevaluation

writing_translate.portuguese: Tão profundas são essas implicações que reavaliação se torna imperativa.
writing_translate.english: So profound are these implications that reassessment becomes imperative.
acceptedVariations: So profound are these implications that reassessment becomes imperative
These implications are so profound that reassessment becomes imperative

writing_translate.portuguese: Pouco anteciparam os observadores o impacto transformador dessas descobertas.
writing_translate.english: Little did observers anticipate the transformative impact of these discoveries.
acceptedVariations: Little did observers anticipate the transformative impact of these discoveries
Observers little anticipated the transformative impact of these discoveries

writing_translate.portuguese: As implicações epistemológicas justificam exame interdisciplinar rigoroso.
writing_translate.english: The epistemological implications warrant rigorous interdisciplinary examination.
acceptedVariations: The epistemological implications warrant rigorous interdisciplinary examination
The epistemological implications require rigorous interdisciplinary examination

writing_translate.portuguese: Não obstante obstáculos substanciais, a iniciativa gerou resultados significativos.
writing_translate.english: Notwithstanding substantial obstacles, the initiative yielded remarkably significant outcomes.
acceptedVariations: Notwithstanding substantial obstacles, the initiative yielded remarkably significant outcomes
Despite substantial obstacles, the initiative yielded remarkably significant outcomes

writing_translate.portuguese: Interrogação epistemológica necessita transcendência de paradigma arraigado.
writing_translate.english: Epistemological interrogation necessitates entrenched paradigm transcendence.
acceptedVariations: Epistemological interrogation necessitates entrenched paradigm transcendence

writing_translate.portuguese: Nexus simbiótico engendra metamorfose societal transformadora.
writing_translate.english: Symbiotic nexus engenders transformative societal metamorphosis.
acceptedVariations: Symbiotic nexus engenders transformative societal metamorphosis

writing_translate.portuguese: Não obstante corroboração incontrovertível, fundamentos teóricos justificam escrutínio.
writing_translate.english: Notwithstanding incontrovertible corroboration, theoretical underpinnings warrant scrutiny.
acceptedVariations: Notwithstanding incontrovertible corroboration, theoretical underpinnings warrant scrutiny
Despite incontrovertible corroboration, theoretical underpinnings warrant scrutiny

writing_translate.portuguese: Manifestação quintessencial reside na orquestração lexical perspicaz.
writing_translate.english: Quintessential manifestation resides in perspicacious lexical orchestration.
acceptedVariations: Quintessential manifestation resides in perspicacious lexical orchestration

writing_order.english: My cat is white.
writing_order.portuguese: Meu gato é branco.

writing_order.english: He has a car.
writing_order.portuguese: Ele tem um carro.

writing_order.english: We live in London.
writing_order.portuguese: Nós moramos em Londres.

writing_order.english: This is my book.
writing_order.portuguese: Este é meu livro.

writing_order.english: I want water please.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu quero água por favor.

writing_order.english: She usually drinks coffee in the morning.
writing_order.portuguese: Ela geralmente toma café de manhã.

writing_order.english: We are going to visit Paris next month.
writing_order.portuguese: Nós vamos visitar Paris no próximo mês.

writing_order.english: He has been here since Monday.
writing_order.portuguese: Ele está aqui desde segunda-feira.

writing_order.english: There are many people in the park.
writing_order.portuguese: Há muitas pessoas no parque.

writing_order.english: I can speak English and Spanish.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu consigo falar inglês e espanhol.

writing_order.english: I wish I could travel more often.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu gostaria de poder viajar com mais frequência.

writing_order.english: She has been working here since last year.
writing_order.portuguese: Ela trabalha aqui desde o ano passado.

writing_order.english: Unless you study hard, you won't pass the test.
writing_order.portuguese: A menos que você estude muito, não passará no teste.

writing_order.english: The restaurant where we had dinner was excellent.
writing_order.portuguese: O restaurante onde jantamos foi excelente.

writing_order.english: I would buy that house if I had enough money.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu compraria aquela casa se tivesse dinheiro suficiente.

writing_order.english: Despite feeling tired, she continued working on the presentation.
writing_order.portuguese: Apesar de se sentir cansada, ela continuou trabalhando na apresentação.

writing_order.english: By next week, I will have finished all my assignments.
writing_order.portuguese: Até a próxima semana, terei terminado todas as minhas tarefas.

writing_order.english: No sooner had he arrived than the meeting started.
writing_order.portuguese: Mal ele chegou, a reunião começou.

writing_order.english: The document, having been reviewed thoroughly, was finally approved.
writing_order.portuguese: O documento, tendo sido revisado minuciosamente, foi finalmente aprovado.

writing_order.english: It's high time we took this matter more seriously.
writing_order.portuguese: Já é hora de levarmos este assunto mais a sério.

writing_order.english: Scarcely had the presentation begun when the power failed.
writing_order.portuguese: Mal a apresentação havia começado quando a energia falhou.

writing_order.english: The policy, albeit controversial, represents considerable progress forward.
writing_order.portuguese: A política, embora controversa, representa progresso considerável.

writing_order.english: Under no circumstances should sensitive data be disclosed publicly.
writing_order.portuguese: Em nenhuma circunstância dados sensíveis devem ser divulgados publicamente.

writing_order.english: Were it not for technology, communication would be significantly limited.
writing_order.portuguese: Não fosse pela tecnologia, a comunicação seria significativamente limitada.

writing_order.english: The research, insofar as it has been validated, supports this hypothesis.
writing_order.portuguese: A pesquisa, na medida em que foi validada, apoia esta hipótese.

writing_order.english: The ramifications extend far beyond conventional economic indicators and projections.
writing_order.portuguese: As ramificações se estendem muito além dos indicadores e projeções econômicas convencionais.

writing_order.english: So profound are these implications that comprehensive reassessment becomes imperative.
writing_order.portuguese: Tão profundas são essas implicações que a reavaliação abrangente se torna imperativa.

writing_order.english: Little did researchers anticipate the transformative impact of these discoveries.
writing_order.portuguese: Pouco anteciparam os pesquisadores o impacto transformador dessas descobertas.

writing_order.english: The epistemological implications warrant rigorous interdisciplinary examination and scrutiny.
writing_order.portuguese: As implicações epistemológicas justificam exame e escrutínio interdisciplinar rigoroso.

writing_order.english: Notwithstanding substantial obstacles, the initiative yielded remarkably significant outcomes.
writing_order.portuguese: Apesar de obstáculos substanciais, a iniciativa gerou resultados notavelmente significativos.

writing_order.english: I like apples.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu gosto de maçãs.

writing_order.english: She is tall.
writing_order.portuguese: Ela é alta.

writing_order.english: The food is good.
writing_order.portuguese: A comida é boa.

writing_order.english: They have a dog.
writing_order.portuguese: Eles têm um cachorro.

writing_order.english: I am a student.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu sou um estudante.

writing_order.english: I don't eat meat.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu não como carne.

writing_order.english: Can you help me?
writing_order.portuguese: Você pode me ajudar?

writing_order.english: I have finished my homework.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu terminei minha lição de casa.

writing_order.english: She is wearing a red dress.
writing_order.portuguese: Ela está vestindo um vestido vermelho.

writing_order.english: Do you like listening to music?
writing_order.portuguese: Você gosta de ouvir música?

writing_order.english: I have been studying English for two years.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu estudo inglês há dois anos.

writing_order.english: If I had time, I would travel more.
writing_order.portuguese: Se eu tivesse tempo, viajaria mais.

writing_order.english: I wish I could speak French fluently.
writing_order.portuguese: Eu gostaria de poder falar francês fluentemente.

writing_order.english: She apologized for arriving late to the meeting.
writing_order.portuguese: Ela se desculpou por chegar atrasada à reunião.

writing_order.english: The book that I bought yesterday was very interesting.
writing_order.portuguese: O livro que eu comprei ontem foi muito interessante.

writing_order.english: The meeting was postponed due to unforeseen circumstances.
writing_order.portuguese: A reunião foi adiada devido a circunstâncias imprevistas.

writing_order.english: Notwithstanding the challenges, we persevered.
writing_order.portuguese: Não obstante os desafios, perseveramos.

writing_order.english: The proposal was met with considerable skepticism.
writing_order.portuguese: A proposta foi recebida com considerável ceticismo.

writing_order.english: Had I known earlier, I would have acted differently.
writing_order.portuguese: Se eu soubesse antes, teria agido de forma diferente.

writing_order.english: The implications of this discovery are far-reaching.
writing_order.portuguese: As implicações desta descoberta são de longo alcance.

writing_order.english: The paradigm shift revolutionized communication methods.
writing_order.portuguese: A mudança de paradigma revolucionou os métodos de comunicação.

writing_order.english: Her eloquence belied her apparent nervousness.
writing_order.portuguese: Sua eloquência contradizia seu aparente nervosismo.

writing_order.english: The juxtaposition of colors creates striking visual impact.
writing_order.portuguese: A justaposição de cores cria impacto visual impressionante.

writing_order.english: Notwithstanding empirical evidence, skepticism endures.
writing_order.portuguese: Não obstante evidência empírica, o ceticismo perdura.

writing_order.english: The paradigm shift revolutionized interaction paradigms.
writing_order.portuguese: A mudança de paradigma revolucionou paradigmas de interação.

writing_order.english: The epistemological foundations warrant meticulous scrutiny.
writing_order.portuguese: Os fundamentos epistemológicos justificam escrutínio meticuloso.

writing_order.english: The symbiotic relationship engenders cultural evolution.
writing_order.portuguese: O relacionamento simbiótico engendra evolução cultural.

writing_order.english: The epistemological foundations necessitate rigorous interrogation.
writing_order.portuguese: Os fundamentos epistemológicos necessitam interrogação rigorosa.

writing_order.english: Notwithstanding incontrovertible substantiation, resistance endures unabated.
writing_order.portuguese: Não obstante substantiação incontrovertível, resistência perdura inabalável.

writing_order.english: The confluence precipitated unprecedented paradigmatic metamorphosis.
writing_order.portuguese: A confluência precipitou metamorfose paradigmática sem precedentes.
